attributes.action:
Conclude a  deal with Europe ie: Canada style trade deal 
 NO DEAL IS NO FUTURE
attributes.additional_details: No deal is a disaster for the next generation in the UK  and  weakens the UK' s position on the world stage
attributes.background: Conclude a deal with the EU

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329500
